fields.name: The Bunny Dare
fields.description: Act like a bunny. Make bunny faces, hop around the room, and shake your little bunny tail.

fields.name: The dance dare
fields.description: Play some music and do a little dance for the other players.

fields.name: Booty shake dare
fields.description: Shake your booty in front of another player (but watch out - the other players might smack your booty!)

fields.name: Strike a Pose Dare
fields.description: Strike a sexy pose in front of the other players.  If the other players don't think your sexy pose is sexy enough, they can make you strike a sexier pose.

fields.name: Lap Dance Dare
fields.description: Start playing a sexy song and give another player a lap dance for the entire song.

fields.name: Nose Nuzzle Dare
fields.description: Give another player a nose nuzzle.

fields.name: Striptease Dare
fields.description: Start some sexy music and slowly strip down to your underwear in front of the other players.
